com.myronmarston.music.settings
Class SelfSimilaritySettings

java.lang.Object
  com.myronmarston.music.settings.SelfSimilaritySettings

public class SelfSimilaritySettings
extends java.lang.Object

Specifies settings for what to apply self-similarity to.

          Default Constructor.

Constructor Detail

SelfSimilaritySettings

public SelfSimilaritySettings()
Default Constructor. Initializes all fields to the value of false.

SelfSimilaritySettings

public SelfSimilaritySettings(boolean applyToPitch,
                              boolean applyToRhythm,
                              boolean applyToVolume)
Constructor.

Parameters:
applyToPitch - whether or not to apply self-similarity to the pitches
applyToRhythm - whether or not to apply self-similarity to the rhythm
applyToVolume - whether or not to apply self-similarity to the volume
Method Detail

getApplyToPitch

public boolean getApplyToPitch()
Gets whether or not to apply self-similarity to the pitch of the germ notes. For example, if true, a germ of G A B G would become G A B G, A B C A, B C D B, G A B G.

Returns:
whether or not to apply self-similarity to the pitch

setApplyToPitch

public void setApplyToPitch(boolean val)
Sets whether or not to apply self-similarity to the pitch of the germ notes. For example, if true, a germ of G A B G would become G A B G, A B C A, B C D B, G A B G.

Parameters:
val - whether or not to apply self-similarity to the pitch

getApplyToRhythm

public boolean getApplyToRhythm()
Gets whether or not to apply self-similarity to the rhythm of the germ. For example, if true, a germ rhythm of 1/4 1/8 1/4 would become 1/4 1/8 1/4, 1/8 1/16 1/8, 1/4 1/8 1/4.

Returns:
whether or not to apply self-similarity to the pitch

setApplyToRhythm

public void setApplyToRhythm(boolean val)
Sets whether or not to apply self-similarity to the rhythm of the germ. For example, if true, a germ rhythm of 1/4 1/8 1/4 would become 1/4 1/8 1/4, 1/8 1/16 1/8, 1/4 1/8 1/4.

Parameters:
val - whether or not to apply self-similarity to the pitch

getApplyToVolume

public boolean getApplyToVolume()
Gets whether or not to apply self-similarity to the volume of the germ notes. For example, if true, a germ with a middle note accent would generate a middle section louder than the surrounding sections, with the middle note of that section still louder.

Returns:
whether or not to apply self-similarity to the volume of the germ notes

setApplyToVolume

public void setApplyToVolume(boolean val)
Sets whether or not to apply self-similarity to the volume of the germ notes. For example, if true, a germ with a middle note accent would generate a middle section louder than the surrounding sections, with the middle note of that section still louder.

Parameters:
val - whether or not to apply self-similarity to the volume of the germ notes
